headline: Why The Narrative Around Intuit Is Shifting With OpenAI Partnership And Credit Karma Momentum
summary: Intuit's latest narrative update comes with a slightly lower fair value estimate of about $803.89 per share, alongside marginal trims to long term revenue growth assumptions and a small cut to the discount rate that reflects a touch less perceived risk. Some market participants argue that the OpenAI partnership and an improving Credit Karma backdrop still support a premium view on the stock by potentially driving stronger than expected revenue and reinforcing confidence in the durability of...
